title: Bob Marley "Exodus" album cover type
content:
Hello All, can anyone help me identify this typeface. Image is attached.  
Thanks for all your help

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [exodus.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20090908035604/http:/typophile.com/files/exodus.jpg) | 15.64 KB |
author: Junkyard Dog

comments.content: Take the spaces out of the file name.
Hello, the image has been fixed. Sorry about that.

I doubt that that is a typeface — it seems more likely to be hand-lettered, so to reproduce it, your best bet is to trace it with Illustrator or FontLab. I’d be happy to see someone prove me wrong, though.

It looks like it is hand-lettered. If you are looking for something similar, try looking for fonts inspired by Arab script, such as Sholomo at  
 [http://moorstation.org/typoasis/designers/steffmann/index.htm](http://web.archive.org/web/20090908035604/http:/moorstation.org/typoasis/designers/steffmann/index.htm "http://moorstation.org/typoasis/designers/steffmann/index.htm"). It’s not quite the same but it’s something to work with

I will most definitely look into both suggestions.  
Thanks

I think it is Hebrew script, not Arabic that you mean. Isn’t the font named Shalom?

ChrisL
